detail_desc: Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a wide belt, zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and fake back pockets. Wide, tapered legs with creases.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Scarf in an airy, patterned weave with fringes along the sides. Size 150x200 cm.
Draped nursing blouse in patterned satin with a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and practical inner top for easier nursing access. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and an elasticated hem.
Fitted vest top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck opening at the front.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, concealed button placket, flap chest pockets, 3/4-length sleeves and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage and ties at the back.
Cold shoulder top in woven fabric with narrow shoulder straps and a wide flounce at the neckline that continues down the sleeves.

Padded jacket in a nylon weave with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with press-studs and a faux-fur trim. Zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lace trim at the hem.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Fully lined, patterned bikini bottoms with a mid waist, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in lightweight organic cotton jersey.
Playsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and front pockets.
Set with a rib-knit hat and a scarf in woven fabric with a lightly brushed finish and fringes along the short sides.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with long sleeves and decorative hole patterns. Seamless.
Long, pleated skirt in airy, patterned chiffon. High waist with wide elastication and a small frill trim. Lined at the top.
Ballet pumps with appliqués on the front, elastic straps over the foot and a grosgrain trim at the top. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Gilet in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, mesh-lined hood with a text print and zipped side pockets. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Sarong in an airy weave. Size 130x150 cm.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned Tencel™ lyocell weave with a turn-down collar, French front and straight hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Set with a top and matching dungaree dress. Long-sleeved top in ribbed cotton jersey with overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Dungaree dress in lightweight cotton twill with press-studs down the front, adjustable straps with metal buckles and patch front pockets.
Short-sleeved body in jersey with a gentle sculpting effect on the tummy. Deep neckline front and back, a lined gusset with concealed press-studs and a high cut at the back.

Non-wired lace bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a lace racer back, an elasticated hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the front.

Short, sleeveless dress in lace with scalloped edges. V-neck, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Seam with a band of hem-stitched embroidery at the waist, and a gently flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Fitted, sleeveless dress in soft jersey with gathers in the sides for best fit.
Long-sleeved blouse in crinkled cotton jersey with a flounce around the neckline, press-studs at the back of the neck and short slits in the sides.
High-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs with raw-edge hems.
Blouse in an airy, crinkled viscose weave with embroidered flowers, a V-neck and ties, 3/4-length trumpet sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
A-line dress in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elastication at the top. Unlined.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Supersoft, low-rise jeggings in softly draping, ultra-light denim that moulds to the body for a feather-light feel. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and a zip fly and button.

Set with a dungaree dress in a stretch weave and top in soft cotton jersey. Dress with a front pocket, adjustable straps with press-studs and a concealed press-stud at one side. Top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves.

department_name: Underwear Jersey Fancy inactive from s1
detail_desc: Trunks in stretch pima cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
V-neck, satin top with a metallic shimmer, narrow shoulder straps and decorative ties at the back. Lined.
Fitted long dress in a rib knit with a square neckline, long sleeves and a high slit at the front.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Coat in a checked weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a single back vent. Flap front pockets and one inner pocket with a button. Tape-trimmed inner seams and lining at the top.
Longer jacket in washed denim with hard-worn details, a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and a raw-edge hem.

Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed section over the foot and slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum fit. Reinforced heel and toe for perfect, friction-free comfort.

Jersey sports top with a zip at the top and stand-up collar with an elastic drawstring. Kangaroo pocket with zips, long sleeves with elasticated trims at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem.
Cardigan in a rib-knit cotton blend with a defined waist. Deep V-neck,buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with wide cuffs.
Vest tops in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, flounce at the top, open back with ties at the back of the neck and elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front.
Kaftan in soft, airy jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, darts at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist to create a fitted silhouette.
Shirt in soft twill with press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Alice bands in different designs. One covered in satin and one made from plastic beads.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt top and bottoms in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a round neckline and print motif on the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs.
Alice band with glittery appliqués on the top.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in soft, pleated jersey with a sheen. Covered elastication at the waist, a high slit at the front and an overlocked hem.
Self-tie silk bow tie with an adjustable strap with a metal fastener at the back.
Vest top in soft jersey.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Fitted, hip-length top in a soft, airy, fine rib knit made from recycled polyester. Wide ribbed sections front and back, slim sleeves in a wide rib knit and a flounced peplum at the hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Baby Exclusive. Dungaree dress in soft organic cotton jersey with straps that fasten with buttons at the top. Elastication at the back, a seam at the front and a flared skirt with patch pockets.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with small frills at the side of the hems.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave. Elastication around the top, short sleeves with a double frill, buttons down the front and a drawstring at the waist.

Spacious shoulder bag in nylon with imitation leather details, a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap, two handles and a zip at the top. Concealed press-studs on the short sides that can be unfastened to make the bag more spacious, three inner compartments, one with a zip, and a reinforced base. Lined. Size 20.5x35.5x39.5 cm.
Bag decoration with a rabbit-shaped soft toy, and a carabiner hook and keyring at the top. Size approx. 10x14 cm.
Vest top in soft slub cotton jersey with a racer back.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Leggings with an elasticated waist and lace-trimmed hems. 90 denier.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a washed look, print motif on the front and roll edges around the neckline and sleeves.
Nylon handbag with imitation leather details, two handles, a zip and a drawstring at the top. One zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 22x35.5x40.5 cm.
Short, straight-cut jacket in fluffy faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and concealed pockets in the side seams. Lined.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of joggers in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a small print motif on the chest, press-studs on the shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with side pockets, elasticated ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a motif on the front.
Cap with an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with an opening at the top with ties at the front and long sleeves with a gathered seam and wide, buttoned cuffs.
